description: Bright 3-bed townhome overlooking greenbelt at Rocklin by Woodridge homes. Lovingly cared for by original owners with 9’ ceilings on every floor. Main floor offers large living & dining areas, chef’s kitchen & powder room. Upper floor features 3 bedrooms, 10’8” vaulted ceilings in primary bedroom overlooking private yard, spa-like ensuite with dual vanities, & full size laundry closet w/ additional shelves. 2-car XL tandem garage with lots of storage options. Fenced in 360sqft backyard overlooking greenbelt with built-in gas bib for summer BBQs! Located on the quietest row within the complex with no-through road but easy access to Rocklin St. Walk to daycare, Victoria Park. Amazing family neighborhood w/ upcoming comm centre, pool, library & schools.
